examples: The wheels of the car began to turn.
Las ruedas del coche empezaron a girar.
I can't get the screw to turn.
No puedo hacer girar el tornillo.
The blades of the helicopter were turning slowly.
Las palas del helicóptero giraban lentamente.
I turned the knob and pushed the door open.
Giré el pomo y abrí la puerta.
